text: Bharat Prasad Sah () is a Nepalese politician. He is a member of Provincial Assembly of Madhesh Province from CPN (Maoist Centre). Sah, a resident of Gaushala, Mahottari, was elected via 2017 Provincial Assembly of Madhesh Province elections from Mahottari 1(B). ==References== Category:Nepalese politicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Bharat Prasad Sah
